data.name: Dormammu
data.description: Lord of the Dark Dimension, Dormammu revives his fallen allies and rains mystic chaos down on his enemies.

starItems.name: Dormammu
starItems.description: Lord of the Dark Dimension, Dormammu revives his fallen allies and rains mystic chaos down on his enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.

This attack cannot miss.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from all enemies, if an enemy does not have <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> other positive effect instead

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from all enemies, if an enemy does not have <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> other positive effect instead.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from all enemies, if an enemy does not have <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> other positive effect instead.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from all enemies, if an enemy does not have <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> other positive effect instead.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>60%</color>

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from all enemies, if an enemy does not have <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> other positive effect instead.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all adjacent targets
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all adjacent targets.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent targets

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all adjacent targets.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent targets

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent targets.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent targets.

Gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies

2.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies

3.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to the primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies

4.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all allies

5.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Healing

6.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns each

7.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from all allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived.
If Health is full at the start of a match and if this character is not a Clone, all allies gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>40%</color> of their character's Max Health.
On Spawn and On Turn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip all positive effects to negative effects on that enemy.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self.
Lower the Assist Chance for all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health
On dropping below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

2.description:
This character cannot be revived.
If Health is full at the start of a match and if this character is not a Clone, all allies gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>40%</color> of their character's Max Health.
On Spawn and On Turn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip all positive effects to negative effects on that enemy.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self.
On dropping below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Lower the Assist Chance for all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Block Chance
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> character

3.description:
This character cannot be revived.
If Health is full at the start of a match and if this character is not a Clone, all allies gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>40%</color> of their character's Max Health.
On Spawn and On Turn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip all positive effects to negative effects on that enemy.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self.
On dropping below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> character.
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Block Chance.
Lower the Assist Chance for all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that enemy
On Spawn and On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
This character cannot be revived.
If Health is full at the start of a match and if this character is not a Clone, all allies gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>40%</color> of their character's Max Health.
On Spawn and On Turn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip all positive effects to negative effects and apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that enemy.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On dropping below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> character.
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Block Chance.
Lower the Assist Chance for all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
On Spawn and On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
This character cannot be revived.
If Health is full at the start of a match and if this character is not a Clone, all allies gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>40%</color> of their character's Max Health.
On Spawn and On Turn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On enemy Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip all positive effects to negative effects and apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that enemy.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self.
On dropping below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> character.
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Block Chance.
Lower the Assist Chance for all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
